title: Can we get old aatrox back
body: Old aatrox was more fun to play

replies.body:
There were less than a handful of mains for old Aatrox, most were just FotM players, as he got really strong with Conqueror and a Trinity build close to his rework, so Riot didn't nerf him for it, so people just went in on the "I'm an Aatrox main" train because it was freelo.

If you guys loved him so much, why did none of you care for him before he got strong?

>most were just fotm players 

literally describes new aatrox to a T

Tbh he only became meta  after god knows how long in pro play and high elo because he abused Conqueror and Guinsoo's. His old kit was poorly designed and just relied on drain tanking and stat checking (basically like old Warwick).
